content: Today 21st Jan 2021, Kees van Bochove is speaking on "Introduction to FAIR principles - Open science through FAIR health data networks: dream or reality?" https://www.cineca-project.eu/news-events-all/introduction-to-fair-principles. This is likely to be relevant to our own efforts.
Very interesting, thank you very much Ian! I'm going to share with FAIR4Health Consortium and with FAIR4Health Open Community for their interest. Best.
